Html: Is there a way to show the legend of a chart from the toolkit on a single line ? It seems like I can modify about anything except if the legend items are stack horizontally or vertically.

Find the answer myself, from a Silverlight forum : Just create a chart style and add this :

 

Setter Property="LegendStyle">
                <Setter.Value>
                    <Style TargetType="datavis:Legend">
                        <Setter Property="Margin" Value="15,0,15,0"/>
                        <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/>
                        <Setter Property="ItemsPanel">
                            <Setter.Value>
                                <ItemsPanelTemplate>
                                    <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center"/>
                                </ItemsPanelTemplate>
                            </Setter.Value>
                        </Setter>
                    </Style>
                </Setter.Value>
            </Setter>
